name: W.O.L.F
description:
Become Wolf, a research staff member, and get to the "place to return". This is an action game that can be played easily with only the mouse!

  • A classic single-player action game that takes you from a "familiar room" to a "place to return to".
  • Easy to use, mouse-only controls!
  • Complete more than 50 challenging action scenes in a mysterious laboratory!

The only actions used are "Jump" and "Wall Stick". However, Wolf bounces around like a golf player!
Use the wall sticking and reflection from the wall to get through the difficult action scenes.
Even if you fail, you can recover instantly! Lead Wolf to the "place to return" while bouncing around in all directions!
